resources.string: your request\nhas been sent\nto your circle
We\'re going to alert your friends that they are part of your circle via SMS
Circle of 6 will work with 3 contacts, but we recommend 6!
Your circle is complete!
getting your location
GPS deactivated. Still want to alert your circle that you need help via SMS?
sms message \"come and get me\" will be sent to your circle with your location
sms message\n\"call me I need an interruption\"\nwill be sent to your circle
sms message\n\"I need to talk\"\nwill be sent to your circle
Your circle will be alerted via SMS that you are OK
cancel
tap \"+\" signs \n to complete \n your circle
ask my\ncircle to
"Need help getting home safely. Location approx, call when ur close:"
"Come and get me-I need help getting home safely. Call ASAP to get my location."
Call and pretend you need me. I need an interruption.
"I need to talk."
"I've gotten help, thanks. You're the best, Circle of 6!"
